name: U.S. business R&D performed, by selected industry and technology focus: 2021
description: U.S. business R&D performed, by selected industry and technology focus: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_technology_focus_of_domestic_r_d_software_products_and_embedded_software
variableMeasured.description: Technology Focus Of Domestic R D Software Products And Embedded Software

variableMeasured.name: field_technology_focus_of_domestic_r_d_biotechnology
variableMeasured.description: Technology Focus Of Domestic R D Biotechnology

variableMeasured.name: field_technology_focus_of_domestic_r_d_nanotechnology
variableMeasured.description: Technology Focus Of Domestic R D Nanotechnology

variableMeasured.name: field_technology_focus_of_domestic_r_d_artificial_intelligence
variableMeasured.description: Technology Focus Of Domestic R D Artificial Intelligence

notes: Data are for companies with 10 or more domestic employees. Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification is based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. Companies could report R&D in one, more than one, or no application area.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey, 2021.
